p.s: In the following I am going to comment on whether the unions really do protect the workers rights or not based on the article Is the usefulness of unions coming to an end? The answer is yes.

First of all it is true that in the past the unions helped to protect the employers from being mistreated but even though they managed to make a change at that time they are not ensuring that the workers have a safe work environment anymore.
Nowadays they are more focused on obstructing companiescompanies' abilities to compete or produce expensive products.
I have to admit that there are a lot of cases where the workers are still being exploited by their employers especially in Bangladesh.
With that being said, I do not agree with the statement that employers are being exploited by the employees when it is clearly the other way around (l. 17-18).
To sum it all up I do agree with the author that the unions are not as useful as they used to be.
But I do not think that the workers are exploiting their employers esspeciallyespecially since there are still a lot of workers who work under terrible working conditions.
